5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Gather the ingredients and tools.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Bring about 1 cup of water to a near boil; measure out 1/4 to 1/2 cup and reserve for making the tea. Fill the matcha bowl about halfway with the remaining hot water. Gently move the bamboo whisk around in the water to soak while the water warms the bowl (about 30 seconds). Discard the water, in the bowl then wipe the bowl dry with a clean towel.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Place a fine-mesh strainer over the bowl. Using the bamboo scoop, sift 2 to 4 heaping piles of matcha into the bowl. Sifting produces a fluffier powder that helps ensure your tea is free of clumps and reduces the amount of whisking required. Any fine-mesh strainer (including a metal tea ball) will work.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Ideally, the reserved water should have cooled down to about 175 F after a few minutes. Pour a couple of tablespoons into the bowl and over the matcha.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Using your thumb and index finger, grasp the bamboo whisk with your dominant hand just above the strings (use the other fingers for support). Hold the bowl with your other hand. Whisk gently in circles to dissolve all the matcha and eliminate clumps.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Pour the remaining water into the bowl and whisk in a "W" pattern until a foam with tiny bubbles forms on the entire surface. When whisking, the ultimate goal is to create a foam with tiny bubbles that are almost unnoticeable. At first, it may take a couple of minutes for the foam to form and it takes practice to master the technique.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Drink the matcha directly from the bowl or pour it into a small cup. It should be drunk immediately and, traditionally, in three sips while cupping the bowl with both hands.
5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a Enjoy!
3c4a849a-4bdf-41b0-b616-a5a03b655880 Gather the ingredients.
3c4a849a-4bdf-41b0-b616-a5a03b655880 Combine all ingredients except ice and sliced cucumber in a large pitcher or bowl.
3c4a849a-4bdf-41b0-b616-a5a03b655880 Cover the pitcher or bowl and chill the mixture for several hours.
3c4a849a-4bdf-41b0-b616-a5a03b655880 When the mixture is well chilled, strain the mint and cucumber if you like.
3c4a849a-4bdf-41b0-b616-a5a03b655880 Add ice to each glass and garnish the rim with sliced cucumbers (and mint if desired). Cucumber also looks nice in the glass not just on the rim.
3c4a849a-4bdf-41b0-b616-a5a03b655880 Serve and enjoy!
419e7ea8-f4e1-412a-984c-80224e57dd2c Gather the ingredients.
419e7ea8-f4e1-412a-984c-80224e57dd2c In a mug, add the honey, cinnamon stick, and lemon twist.
419e7ea8-f4e1-412a-984c-80224e57dd2c Add the tea bag and fill with hot water. Let steep for 3 to 5 minutes, according to the tea's recommended time (typically on the packaging or you can use suggested brewing times for the type of tea).
419e7ea8-f4e1-412a-984c-80224e57dd2c Remove the tea bag and add a splash of cream.
419e7ea8-f4e1-412a-984c-80224e57dd2c Stir well.
419e7ea8-f4e1-412a-984c-80224e57dd2c Serve and enjoy!
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 Gather the ingredients.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 Pre-heat the oven to 425 F.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 Add the all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon and ground ginger to a large bowl. Add the chilled butter pieces and cut the butter in using a pastry cutter, a fork, or even your fingers, until all the dry ingredients are coated and the mixture resembles course crumbs. Place the bowl in the refrigerator for about 10 minutes.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 In a separate bowl, whisk together the unsweetened pumpkin puree, heavy cream and vanilla extract. Stir the wet ingredients into the flour and butter mixture, just until combined. The dough will be sticky.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 Turn the dough out onto a well floured board and roll, or pat, out the dough to about an inch thick. Fold it over and repeat about 6 times. This will give you the classic layered look of a scone.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 Roll, or pat, the final time to an inch thick circle. Cut into 8 pieces and place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 Bake in the pre-heated oven for approximately 18 minutes, or until the scones are a very light golden brown. Do not over-bake.
dd7e93ca-3260-4747-b304-6dc1198480c3 While the scones are cooling, make the sweet tahini glaze by whisking together the powdered sugar, milk or cream, sesame paste and salt until smooth. Drizzle over the cooled scones.
bde3ec6e-e3be-4673-a2a6-123f5e425077 Gather the ingredients.
bde3ec6e-e3be-4673-a2a6-123f5e425077 In a double old-fashioned glass, add bourbon and limoncello.
bde3ec6e-e3be-4673-a2a6-123f5e425077 Fill the glass with ice and top with iced tea.
bde3ec6e-e3be-4673-a2a6-123f5e425077 Garnish with lemon. Serve and enjoy.
d8505104-8618-4458-a515-469ac2e3a69e Pour the hot water over the tea leaves.
d8505104-8618-4458-a515-469ac2e3a69e Steep for 4 to 6 minutes and then remove the tea leaves.
d8505104-8618-4458-a515-469ac2e3a69e Add the honey and stir.
d8505104-8618-4458-a515-469ac2e3a69e Pour the tea over ice.
45b1a7ab-9076-4370-b526-d7c3dc2783c4 Gather the ingredients.
45b1a7ab-9076-4370-b526-d7c3dc2783c4 Pour the cooled tea and lemongrass brew into a pitcher. Stir in enough sugar syrup to sweeten according to your preferred level of sweetness.
45b1a7ab-9076-4370-b526-d7c3dc2783c4 Stir in kalamansi juice, one tablespoonful at a time, and tasting after each addition.
45b1a7ab-9076-4370-b526-d7c3dc2783c4 Add ice, stir and serve.
45b1a7ab-9076-4370-b526-d7c3dc2783c4 Enjoy!
5b95044f-54a8-4fc6-bfc4-cb3790b331ed Gather the ingredients.
5b95044f-54a8-4fc6-bfc4-cb3790b331ed In a warm Irish coffee glass or mug, add the honey, lemon juice, and spices.
5b95044f-54a8-4fc6-bfc4-cb3790b331ed Top with hot, freshly brewed tea.
5b95044f-54a8-4fc6-bfc4-cb3790b331ed Stir well.
5b95044f-54a8-4fc6-bfc4-cb3790b331ed Garnish with a lemon wedge.
5b95044f-54a8-4fc6-bfc4-cb3790b331ed Serve and enjoy.
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 Gather the ingredients.
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 Grind 1 cup of coarsely ground coffee beans.
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 In a large jar, add the ground coffee. Slowly pour 4 cups of water over the beans as you stir until the coffee is thoroughly saturated.
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 Cover the container with a lid or plastic wrap. Place it in the refrigerator and let it steep for at least 12 hours. You can brew up to 24 hours, depending on your personal taste.
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 Filter the beans from the coffee. Pour slowly and stop as needed to avoid overflowing the filter.
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 Store filtered cold-brew in an air-tight container in the refrigerator. It will stay fresh for up to a week—a shelf life hot-brewed coffee can't touch!
192f6377-622b-4688-8116-dea7f3f2a426 Serve and enjoy!
b2094309-2133-4c9f-9089-cf7ee993ef42 Gather the ingredients.
b2094309-2133-4c9f-9089-cf7ee993ef42 Add the coffee grounds and cinnamon to the filter basket of your coffee pot. Then add the 5 cups of water to the pot and brew as you normally would.
b2094309-2133-4c9f-9089-cf7ee993ef42 While the coffee is brewing, bring the milk, heavy cream, brown sugar, and chocolate syrup to a gentle simmer in a small saucepan. Make sure to cook on low heat so you don’t burn the mixture.
b2094309-2133-4c9f-9089-cf7ee993ef42 Remove from the heat and add the brewed coffee to the milk mixture and whisk in the vanilla extract.
b2094309-2133-4c9f-9089-cf7ee993ef42 Divide the coffee among four cups and top with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon. Enjoy immediately.
83c191bc-dd62-4bde-9aba-a8a14ebf20f0 Gather the ingredients.
83c191bc-dd62-4bde-9aba-a8a14ebf20f0 In a chilled glass or dessert dish, place a large scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream.
83c191bc-dd62-4bde-9aba-a8a14ebf20f0 Slowly pour the espresso or coffee over the ice cream.
83c191bc-dd62-4bde-9aba-a8a14ebf20f0 Garnish with shaved or grated chocolate.
83c191bc-dd62-4bde-9aba-a8a14ebf20f0 Serve with a spoon and enjoy!
d2948005-e11c-4a7a-8653-b9d371a91eed Gather the ingredients.
d2948005-e11c-4a7a-8653-b9d371a91eed Add the instant coffee, sugar and hot or boiling water to large liquid measuring cup.
d2948005-e11c-4a7a-8653-b9d371a91eed Divide the milk amongst two glasses and top with ice.
d2948005-e11c-4a7a-8653-b9d371a91eed Split the whipped coffee over the top of each glass and serve immediately.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a Gather the ingredients.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a In a large stovetop espresso maker, brew coffee according to the manufacturer's instructions using fine-ground coffee.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a In a glass measuring cup with at least 2 cup capacity, add the sugar. Once a little bit of coffee has brewed, add about 1 tablespoon to the sugar. Reserve a little extra coffee concentrate in a small dish to use if needed. Place the pot back on the stove to finish brewing.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a Make the espuma by using a small whisk or spoon to vigorously beat the sugar and espresso until it is a pale brown, almost foamy paste, about 2 to 3 minutes. You cannot beat it too much.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a When the coffee has finished brewing, pour it over the espuma while stirring to incorporate. Let the foamy crema rise to the top.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a Pour into individual demitasse espresso cups. Shake the measuring cup a little and use a spoon as you pour to get crema into each cup.
2991f1d0-4846-4813-b185-7424727d4e7a Serve and enjoy!
579364e6-a140-4059-a3d4-d2a457c51f23 Gather the ingredients.
579364e6-a140-4059-a3d4-d2a457c51f23 In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine the chocolate chips and coconut oil. Microwave in 30 second intervals, stirring after each interval until smooth.
579364e6-a140-4059-a3d4-d2a457c51f23 Dip the coffee beans in the melted chocolate. Mixing well to ensure each bean is evenly coated.
579364e6-a140-4059-a3d4-d2a457c51f23 Using a fork, remove one bean at a time, letting excess chocolate drip off, and place it on a waxed paper or parchment lined baking sheet.
579364e6-a140-4059-a3d4-d2a457c51f23 If desired, the chocolate covered coffee beans can be rolled in unsweetened cocoa powder for a different appearance and texture.
9bb1f9ea-57d1-4441-8790-3121d2a21d1e Gather the ingredients.
9bb1f9ea-57d1-4441-8790-3121d2a21d1e Heat the water to 200 F.
9bb1f9ea-57d1-4441-8790-3121d2a21d1e Place the coffee into your filter of choice. A French drip filter positioned over a cup or glass works best.
9bb1f9ea-57d1-4441-8790-3121d2a21d1e Very slowly pour the hot water through the coffee grounds, letting the liquid slowly drip through to the glass or cup below. Don't add the water too fast to ensure the filter stays positioned at the top of the glass.
9bb1f9ea-57d1-4441-8790-3121d2a21d1e Add condensed milk to taste, and enjoy hot or iced. Hot Vietnamese coffee is stronger and thicker, similar to espresso.
9bb1f9ea-57d1-4441-8790-3121d2a21d1e To serve cold, pour the coffee and condensed milk into a tall glass filled with ice. Serve immediately.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Gather the ingredients and tools.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Pour hot water into the serving cup to warm it.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Add water to a gooseneck kettle and heat it on the stove until it reaches between 195 F and 205 F.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Grind coffee beans to a medium to fine ground (about the size of kosher salt or coarse sand).
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Measure the ground coffee in the pour-over brewer.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb When the water is heated, dump the water from the cup. Set the drip cone on the cup's rim. If using an all-in-one brewer, assemble the pieces, then measure the coffee.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Zero out the scale and start the timer. Beginning in the center of the coffee grounds and working your way around, pour just enough water (about 1 3/4 ounces/50 mL) from the kettle to wet all of the coffee. Let it bloom and saturate the coffee for between 30 and 45 seconds.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb With the kettle spout as close to the cone as possible, continue to slowly pour water over the bed of coffee. Work in even circles, starting in the middle and moving outwards (when the water drains, the grounds should be flat, not concave). Do not pour water onto the cone or filter, only onto the coffee. Pause as needed to let it catch up until you have poured the full 10 ounces (300mL) of water.
8c4aace3-83af-46f2-b952-c27465bf1bfb Tap the cone to release the last bits of coffee, then set it on a second cup or saucer to catch any additional drips. Serve and enjoy!
41e2e65f-256d-4a5c-b694-f76d6c924324 Gather the ingredients.
41e2e65f-256d-4a5c-b694-f76d6c924324 Add the prepared espresso to a small saucepan. The espresso can be prepared hours ahead of time or fresh. Whisk in the pumpkin puree, heavy cream, whole milk, pumpkin spice, and erythritol. Heat until steaming, then remove from the stove.
41e2e65f-256d-4a5c-b694-f76d6c924324 Froth the contents with a hand-held frother. You can also whisk vigorously. Just be careful not to splash yourself as you are stirring.
41e2e65f-256d-4a5c-b694-f76d6c924324 Top with prepared whipped cream and a little cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice and serve immediately.
641718a9-20a6-4710-b916-91e335dbbf3a Gather the ingredients.
641718a9-20a6-4710-b916-91e335dbbf3a Brew the coffee according to your brewer instructions.
641718a9-20a6-4710-b916-91e335dbbf3a Add the hot coffee to a warm mason jar that has a strong lid. Add the whole milk, heavy cream, cocoa powder, sugar, and vanilla extract to the jar. Put the lid back on and then cover the top with a clean towel in case the jar does leak. Shake the jar for 30 seconds or until the sugar has dissolved. It will also get nice and frothy. You can also use a milk frother instead of shaking.
641718a9-20a6-4710-b916-91e335dbbf3a You can decide to heat the coffee back up if you wish, either before or after adding whipped cream. Just pop it in the microwave for 30 seconds to one minute or heat on the stove until steaming. Then serve with chocolate shavings and enjoy!
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 Gather the ingredients.
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 Pour hot water into the serving cup to heat it while the coffee's brewing.
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 In a 3-cup stovetop espresso maker, add finely ground coffee and water according to the manufacturer's instructions. Heat on the stove to brew.
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 In a small saucepan over low heat, pour the milk and heat gently until it steams and there are small bubbles around the edges. Do not let it boil. Stir occasionally to prevent a film from forming on the top.
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 When the espresso has brewed, dump the water from the cup. Fill it halfway with freshly brewed espresso.
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 Slowly pour the steamed milk over the espresso and stir to incorporate. Add sugar to taste.
16e6081c-d1ce-41b8-a13a-803d09f657d1 Serve and enjoy!
ad295fe1-9fba-4164-8d7f-3300449607ee Gather the ingredients.
ad295fe1-9fba-4164-8d7f-3300449607ee Add the milk and the white chocolate chips to a heavy bottom pot. Whisk together, on medium-low heat, until the white chocolate has been incorporated and the sauce is smooth.
ad295fe1-9fba-4164-8d7f-3300449607ee Brew a half cup of your favorite coffee or espresso and pour into a cup or mug. Pour the white chocolate milk sauce over the coffee and stir in any additional sugar, if desired.
ad295fe1-9fba-4164-8d7f-3300449607ee Top with either homemade or store-bought whipped cream and sprinkle on a light dusting of ground nutmeg.
ad295fe1-9fba-4164-8d7f-3300449607ee Serve and enjoy!
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Gather the ingredients.
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Add the unsweetened pumpkin puree, sugar, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, cloves, vanilla and espresso to a small pot.
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Bring to a simmer on a medium low flame and whisk occasionally until the pumpkin puree has been incorporated and the sugar and spices dissolved.
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Add the milk to a second pot or to a microwave safe jar and heat just enough to warm through.
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Whisk the milk vigorously until it begins to foam or froth. Alternately, if you have a milk frother wand, use this to create the foam desired.
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Pour the hot coffee mixture into a mug and then pour in the frothy milk.
3486464b-91fa-43dc-a264-bc46fdc5884f Top with whipped cream and a dash of cinnamon, if desired.
53fadefd-a558-4d7b-b1cd-a3fc9b8588fb Gather the ingredients.
53fadefd-a558-4d7b-b1cd-a3fc9b8588fb In a pre-heated coffee mug or Irish coffee glass, pour the bourbon and honey liqueur.
53fadefd-a558-4d7b-b1cd-a3fc9b8588fb Fill with freshly-brewed hot coffee.
53fadefd-a558-4d7b-b1cd-a3fc9b8588fb Garnish with whipped cream if desired.
53fadefd-a558-4d7b-b1cd-a3fc9b8588fb Serve and enjoy!
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d Gather the ingredients.
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d Add hot water to a large measuring cup or medium-sized bowl and whisk in the espresso granules until they dissolve.
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d Whisk in the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, and salt until completely combined. Set it in the refrigerator to cool while you prepare the heavy cream.
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d Beat the heavy cream with a hand mixer until it becomes whipped cream and stiff peaks form.
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d Whisk in the sweetened condensed milk mixture until completely combined, but do not over mix.
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d Pour the ice cream into a loaf pan. Cover it in plastic wrap and place it in the freezer for least 6 hours, or until completely frozen. Making it and letting it freeze over night works the best.
81961229-048c-4c8e-aa9c-be035ba8c38d When ready to serve, heat an ice cream scoop with hot water, scoop the ice cream, and serve with chocolate chips, amaretto cookies, or other sweet crumbled cookie toppings.
14b05c5c-36ec-4876-968f-6b742791cc70 Gather the ingredients.
14b05c5c-36ec-4876-968f-6b742791cc70 Bring water and sugar to a boil in an ibrik. If you do not have an ibrik, a small saucepan will work.
14b05c5c-36ec-4876-968f-6b742791cc70 Remove from heat and add coffee and cardamom.
14b05c5c-36ec-4876-968f-6b742791cc70 Return saucepan to heat and allow to come to a boil. Remove from heat when coffee foams.
14b05c5c-36ec-4876-968f-6b742791cc70 Again, return to heat, allowing to foam and remove from heat again.
14b05c5c-36ec-4876-968f-6b742791cc70 Pour into 2 demitasse cups, and let them sit for a few minutes so the grounds can settle to the bottom of the cups. If using a cardamom pod, it can be served with the coffee for added flavor. Serve and enjoy!
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Gather the ingredients.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Combine water and tea leaves in a small saucepan over medium heat.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Bring to a low boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Remove from heat. Stir in sweetened, condensed milk. Return to heat.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Return to a boil. Simmer for 3 more minutes.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Strain tea and condensed milk.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Serve hot or (optional) chill and serve over ice. Small glasses are ideal.
50a9a0bf-cf25-4964-9076-a2ccdfb86334 Serve and enjoy!
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 In a saucepan, combine the heavy cream, 1/3 cup of granulated sugar, and espresso powder. Blend well and bring the mixture to a simmer. Pour through a fine mesh strainer into a bowl and set aside for about 15 minutes or until it cools to room temperature.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Heat the oven to 325 F (165 C/Gas 3).
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Arrange six to eight ramekins in a 9-by-13-by-2-inch metal baking pan. If you are using wide shallow ramekins, you might need two pans.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 In a medium bowl, whisk the egg yolks with the cinnamon. Whisk in the cream mixture until well blended.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Ladle the mixture into the ramekins and fill the outer pan with hot tap water. The water should come about halfway up the sides of the ramekins. You might want to put the pan in the oven before you add the hot water. Try to avoid sloshing when you move the pan.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, depending on the depth of the creme brulee. They should be set with only a slight jiggle. Very carefully remove the pan(s) from the oven. Remove the ramekins from the pan—use a spatula and oven mitt—to a rack to cool. Cover and refrigerate them for three to four hours or until thoroughly chilled. They can be made a day in advance.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 When you are ready to serve, take the ramekins out of the refrigerator.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Sprinkle 1 1/2 to 2 teaspoons of superfine sugar over each creme brulee, depending on the surface area of the ramekins. Gently rotate the ramekin on the countertop to distribute the sugar evenly over the top.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Use a kitchen torch to melt the sugar, using a protected hand to move the ramekin quarter-turns as you torch it. The ramekin will be hot, so take care.
3b5d0c6e-db72-4221-bd8e-8d86e55d33a9 Alternatively, arrange the ramekins on a baking sheet and place them under the broiler. Watch closely and rotate the pan to melt the sugar evenly.
e6bd4b45-7506-4728-a2e8-8cb0c86fcc9d In a traditional ibrik or small saucepan combine all ingredients.
e6bd4b45-7506-4728-a2e8-8cb0c86fcc9d Bring the mixture to a boil and remove from heat.
e6bd4b45-7506-4728-a2e8-8cb0c86fcc9d Once the coffee stops bubbling, place it back onto stovetop and allow to come to a boil once more. Remove from heat and repeat.
5534f883-30d1-44c4-8709-39c2f9f62c68 Gather the ingredients.
5534f883-30d1-44c4-8709-39c2f9f62c68 In a blender, add the banana, pear, almond milk, ginger, honey, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon. Add the kale and then the ice on top to weigh it down.
5534f883-30d1-44c4-8709-39c2f9f62c68 Blend until perfectly smooth (two to three minutes, depending on your blender). You may need to push the ingredients down halfway through blending.
5534f883-30d1-44c4-8709-39c2f9f62c68 Serve and enjoy!
3deb37e1-0fc3-4130-8158-1dee6b8a6ac8 Gather the ingredients.
3deb37e1-0fc3-4130-8158-1dee6b8a6ac8 Add ice, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut to a blender
3deb37e1-0fc3-4130-8158-1dee6b8a6ac8 Blend until slushy.
3deb37e1-0fc3-4130-8158-1dee6b8a6ac8 Pour into a chilled hurricane glass and garnish with an orange slice.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Gather the ingredients.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Build the liquid ingredients in a highball glass over ice cubes. Start by pouring the vodka, and then add the tomato juice, lemon juice, and the dash of Worcheshire sauce.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Add the celery salt, pepper, and hot sauce to taste. If using, add the horseradish.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Stir well, or try rolling the drink.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Taste and adjust the seasonings to your liking.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Garnish with a lemon wedge and celery stalk or pickle.
20b0df14-224c-4e10-a932-9fd8dce5655a Serve and enjoy.
81a593b5-8f0d-469f-a22b-13c4e45e2ade Gather your ingredients.
81a593b5-8f0d-469f-a22b-13c4e45e2ade Put the juice, coconut milk, pineapple then ice cream into your blender.
81a593b5-8f0d-469f-a22b-13c4e45e2ade Blend on high until completely blended, smooth and creamy, adding a little more juice to help it blend, if needed. It's typically very thick, so you will need to stop and scrape down the sides.
81a593b5-8f0d-469f-a22b-13c4e45e2ade Spoon the mixture into glasses or ice cream cups and serve. If you're feeling fancy, place the mixture into a piping bag with a star tip. Pipe it into the cups, add a little fresh pineapple garnish, and dig in.
da1d02d5-9259-4e5a-9588-ca5761435d2a Gather the ingredients.
da1d02d5-9259-4e5a-9588-ca5761435d2a Add the frozen raspberries, frozen pineapple chunks, banana, and orange pineapple juice to a quality blender. If you are adding yogurt, add it at this time as well. It is not necessary to cut up the banana if it is fresh. If it is frozen you may want to cut it in half. It's also helpful if you are freezing bananas yourself to freeze them in chunks!
da1d02d5-9259-4e5a-9588-ca5761435d2a Blend the fruit and juice on high for a minute or so. Make sure the lid is securely placed on top of your blender so you don't have an explosion! Then turn the blender speed down to a lower setting for a minute or so to help create a smooth texture.
da1d02d5-9259-4e5a-9588-ca5761435d2a Pour the smoothie into a large glass or to go container and use a smoothie straw to drink it up! You can probably share this smoothie with someone else, but we can drink this recipe in one sitting!
3beb204e-20ce-4073-80fc-b694125af057 Gather the ingredients.
3beb204e-20ce-4073-80fc-b694125af057 Mix all ingredients together in a mixer.
3beb204e-20ce-4073-80fc-b694125af057 Run on high for 5 minutes.
3beb204e-20ce-4073-80fc-b694125af057 Drink your juice as soon as possible for the highest nutrient content. Enjoy!
b5d8e861-8c69-49c6-9712-46ef6951d553 Wash vegetables.
b5d8e861-8c69-49c6-9712-46ef6951d553 Cut all vegetables into 1-2 inch cubes.
b5d8e861-8c69-49c6-9712-46ef6951d553 Put all vegetables through a juicer.
b5d8e861-8c69-49c6-9712-46ef6951d553 Add milk and sweetener to taste.
b5d8e861-8c69-49c6-9712-46ef6951d553 Shake or blend the mixture.
3c6c8f9f-6ee6-4f11-8c17-9248b7678102 Kumquats can be juiced or blended peel, seeds and all!
3c6c8f9f-6ee6-4f11-8c17-9248b7678102 Add protein powder, walnuts and flaxseeds for extra energy pre- and post-workout or turmeric for extra disease-fighting power!
3c6c8f9f-6ee6-4f11-8c17-9248b7678102 A simple recipe but delicious and a nutrient powerhouse!
3b23fdfb-b5a0-48df-958f-0e435b730576 Gather the ingredients.
3b23fdfb-b5a0-48df-958f-0e435b730576 Tip the frozen fruits, milk, and acai powder into a blender and blitz until smooth. Pour into a glass and drink immediately.
3b23fdfb-b5a0-48df-958f-0e435b730576 The smoothie will keep in the refrigerator or a vacuum sealed container for a few hours, but is always best when fresh.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Wash, peel and grate the raw mangoes. Mix the mangoes, sugar, and water in a deep saucepan or pressure cooker and boil till the mangoes are soft.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Put this mixture into a food processor and blend till smooth.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Put the blended mix back into the saucepan and on a medium flame.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Add the remaining ingredients and cook for another 20 minutes.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Take off from the fire and allow to cool completely.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Pour into glasses, dilute with a little chilled water if needed, mix well and add crushed ice.
e60e1003-7960-4286-9867-23f1a2db82ed Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.
634dbabd-de98-4cdf-bfad-b91f61c33c08 Blend all ingredients until smooth, adding more water if desired.
e76850df-3648-4918-8670-49a68b3a9f13 Gather the ingredients.
e76850df-3648-4918-8670-49a68b3a9f13 Place the coconut milk, orange juice, honey, frozen raspberries, and ice in a large blender. Blend on high until the smoothie is totally smooth. If you use a frozen banana instead of the ice you don't need to add the honey.
e76850df-3648-4918-8670-49a68b3a9f13 Split the smoothie between two large smoothie glasses. Use a smoothie straw as it will be nice and thick! Garnish with fresh raspberries and serve immediately (it really only tastes good when it is still cold!)
57cb2338-cc82-4c09-830a-4dfcc7763a12 Pour the peach nectar into a Champagne flute.
57cb2338-cc82-4c09-830a-4dfcc7763a12 Slowly add the sparkling cider.
57cb2338-cc82-4c09-830a-4dfcc7763a12 Garnish with a peach slice, if available.
959d4a6a-400c-49d9-be05-ae95dd5a12e9 Wearing rubber gloves, peel the turnip and beet and slice them. Peel the carrots and divide them into fours.
959d4a6a-400c-49d9-be05-ae95dd5a12e9 Wrap the half a loaf of bread in the cheesecloth and tie off the end to make a ‘hobo sack.’ Put the sack inside the glass jar. Add the sliced vegetables and all the other ingredients except the salt.
959d4a6a-400c-49d9-be05-ae95dd5a12e9 In a separate container, mix the salt with about 3 cups of purified water to dissolve it, then pour it into the jar. Add more water if needed to fill the jar to the top with liquid, ensuring that all vegetables are completely covered in liquid. This is key to ensuring a safe environment for the vegetables to ferment. Close the lid tightly.
959d4a6a-400c-49d9-be05-ae95dd5a12e9 Set the jar aside in a cool place to ferment for 15 days. Don’t attempt to open the jar before 15 days pass.
959d4a6a-400c-49d9-be05-ae95dd5a12e9 After 15 days, open the jar and remove the cheesecloth and bread. The bread has acted as the fermenting agent. Like all fermented items, particularly turnips, the aroma may be pungent. This is normal, and a sign of good fermentation. Once you chill it, your ‘şalgam’ juice is ready to drink. You can serve the now pickled vegetables alongside to munch on.
8eed5bd8-e55d-4042-a8f3-0157e4239b8d Gather the ingredients.
8eed5bd8-e55d-4042-a8f3-0157e4239b8d Add the Royal Hawaiian Orchards Macadamia Nut Milk, honey, and almond butter to the bottom of a blender. Pulse a few times to combine.
8eed5bd8-e55d-4042-a8f3-0157e4239b8d Add the spinach on top of the liquid, followed by the banana slices and cored, sliced, and seeded Fuji apple. Pulse a few times to begin breaking up the ingredients. Increase speed to high to combine and liquefy the ingredients.
8eed5bd8-e55d-4042-a8f3-0157e4239b8d Stir in the flax seed or chia seeds until well combined.
8eed5bd8-e55d-4042-a8f3-0157e4239b8d Pour smoothie into two glasses. Enjoy immediately.
d29605fb-4041-4791-b2d5-a7c4bd6a8591 Gather the ingredients.
d29605fb-4041-4791-b2d5-a7c4bd6a8591 In a blender, blend together the banana, ice cubes, blueberries, and liquid until smooth.
d29605fb-4041-4791-b2d5-a7c4bd6a8591 Add spinach and blend again until completely smooth and creamy.
d29605fb-4041-4791-b2d5-a7c4bd6a8591 No sweetener is needed in this recipe, as the blueberries carry the flavor and are plenty sweet on their own, but if you find this smoothie a bit too bland, try adding a touch of agave nectar to give it a bit more zing.
d29605fb-4041-4791-b2d5-a7c4bd6a8591 Serve and enjoy!
c9042976-03cd-4f28-92dc-b49f2a547e66 Gather the ingredients.
c9042976-03cd-4f28-92dc-b49f2a547e66 Open can of oranges and drain.
c9042976-03cd-4f28-92dc-b49f2a547e66 Place in a zip-top plastic bag and freeze several hours.
c9042976-03cd-4f28-92dc-b49f2a547e66 Place the frozen oranges and pineapple chunks in the bottom of a blender, Vita-Mix, or food processor.
c9042976-03cd-4f28-92dc-b49f2a547e66 Add the remaining ingredients in the order listed. Puree until the mixture reaches the texture of a milkshake. Add more ice, if desired, until an icy consistency is achieved.
c9042976-03cd-4f28-92dc-b49f2a547e66 Serve and enjoy!
6ee0381f-362b-4acb-a71e-8c0fd3675475 Gather the ingredients.
6ee0381f-362b-4acb-a71e-8c0fd3675475 Place the frozen açaí and the passion fruit purée in a blender, along with one banana, the orange juice (if using), and the sugar. Blend until smooth and thick. (The mixture should have the texture of a soft sorbet that you would eat with a spoon.) Taste and add more sugar if desired, or a bit of lime juice for extra tartness.
6ee0381f-362b-4acb-a71e-8c0fd3675475 Place the fruit mixture in a bowl. Slice the remaining banana and place the slices on top of the acai. Sprinkle granola over the fruit.
6ee0381f-362b-4acb-a71e-8c0fd3675475 Enjoy immediately!
cd552bc1-2839-4173-9f48-8f949005e374 Place the milk, banana, peanut butter, cinnamon, and honey (if using) into a blender, and puree until smooth.
cd552bc1-2839-4173-9f48-8f949005e374 Add the ice cubes and pulse just until the ice is crushed.
cd552bc1-2839-4173-9f48-8f949005e374 Pour into a glass, sprinkle with additional cinnamon.
f7a717a7-163e-4840-a740-dbca28f53bb2 Gather the ingredients.
f7a717a7-163e-4840-a740-dbca28f53bb2 Combine in a blender and blend until desired smoothness.
e32dc9a8-012e-4159-bb21-367a1aca5a60 Gather the ingredients.
e32dc9a8-012e-4159-bb21-367a1aca5a60 Peel the avocado and cut in half. Discard the pit.
e32dc9a8-012e-4159-bb21-367a1aca5a60 Put the avocado and the sugar in a blender with 1 cup of milk. Blend until very creamy and smooth.
e32dc9a8-012e-4159-bb21-367a1aca5a60 Gradually add another cup or two of milk to make the shake as thin or as thick as you like. How much milk you need will depend on the size and ripeness of the avocado.
e32dc9a8-012e-4159-bb21-367a1aca5a60 Add a handful of ice to the blender if you like your shake well-chilled, and blend for another minute. Taste and adjust sugar if necessary.
e32dc9a8-012e-4159-bb21-367a1aca5a60 Pour into glasses and serve.
14533d9e-543f-4165-b057-91935cc5dec6 Gather the ingredients.
14533d9e-543f-4165-b057-91935cc5dec6 Place the pumpkin pie filling, milk, maple syrup, protein powder, and vanilla extract in a blender. If you are adding banana or pecans, also add them at this time.
14533d9e-543f-4165-b057-91935cc5dec6 Blend the ingredients until completely smooth. If using fresh banana instead of frozen, you can add a handful of ice cubes to give it a thicker consistency.
14533d9e-543f-4165-b057-91935cc5dec6 Pour the smoothie into a glass and garnish with a little more pumpkin pie spice and chopped pecans if you wish.
14533d9e-543f-4165-b057-91935cc5dec6 Serve and enjoy!
b1622404-6908-4648-87b5-8b4c8eec2fb1 Gather the ingredients.
b1622404-6908-4648-87b5-8b4c8eec2fb1 Add first 3 ingredients into a high powered blender and blend until smooth.
b1622404-6908-4648-87b5-8b4c8eec2fb1 Taste and adjust mint extract as needed. If using chocolate syrup, drizzle some into a mason jar or serving glass and freeze glass for 5 minutes.
b1622404-6908-4648-87b5-8b4c8eec2fb1 Pour shake into each glass.
b1622404-6908-4648-87b5-8b4c8eec2fb1 Top with whipped cream if desired.
b486a632-dd2b-4f31-a0a9-dbbcf21b3d4b Gather the ingredients.
b486a632-dd2b-4f31-a0a9-dbbcf21b3d4b Combine all of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth.
b486a632-dd2b-4f31-a0a9-dbbcf21b3d4b Serve with a smoothie straw for easier drinking.
048c8e41-4205-4e40-9b48-a55cfc1e088b Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth.
a8db8533-00bd-4a29-9af9-818b8aa5993a Place frozen strawberries in the blender or food processor first.
a8db8533-00bd-4a29-9af9-818b8aa5993a Add milk and juice. Top with remaining ingredients.
a8db8533-00bd-4a29-9af9-818b8aa5993a Puree until smooth, stopping to push the ​fruit down into the blades of the blender, if necessary.
d0087c10-9bf3-4e2b-982b-0f3ac1240da4 Gather the ingredients.
d0087c10-9bf3-4e2b-982b-0f3ac1240da4 Pour the ingredients into a blender in the following order: honey, vanilla extract, bananas, vanilla yogurt, and ice.
d0087c10-9bf3-4e2b-982b-0f3ac1240da4 Gradually increase the speed and blend until the mixture is smooth.
d0087c10-9bf3-4e2b-982b-0f3ac1240da4 Pour the drink into a chilled glass.
d0087c10-9bf3-4e2b-982b-0f3ac1240da4 Serve and enjoy.
4cbf4afd-cbf2-409b-9334-adab7886a4f7 Gather the ingredients.
4cbf4afd-cbf2-409b-9334-adab7886a4f7 Place the strawberries in the bottom of a blender or food processor fitted with a metal blade. Add the cranberry-raspberry juice and orange juice and top with vanilla yogurt.
4cbf4afd-cbf2-409b-9334-adab7886a4f7 Cover and immediately blend until smooth, scraping down the sides if needed.
4cbf4afd-cbf2-409b-9334-adab7886a4f7 Pour into glasses and garnish each with a strawberry. Serve immediately.
d01205fd-bd3c-4aca-b934-41566f1430e3 Combine peaches with pineapple juice and sugar in a blender until smooth.
d01205fd-bd3c-4aca-b934-41566f1430e3 Add ice cream and blend until soft.
d01205fd-bd3c-4aca-b934-41566f1430e3 Pour in milk and pulse to mix in.
d01205fd-bd3c-4aca-b934-41566f1430e3 Pour shake into chilled glasses.
78b46543-435b-4c8f-81af-ed6cf12711c0 Gather the ingredients.
78b46543-435b-4c8f-81af-ed6cf12711c0 Blend all of the ingredients together for 10 to 20 seconds or until the greens have completely blended in.
78b46543-435b-4c8f-81af-ed6cf12711c0 You may need to add a little bit more or less of the liquid in order to get everything moving and incorporated, and, if you prefer a colder drink, add a couple of ice cubes into the mix as well.
78b46543-435b-4c8f-81af-ed6cf12711c0 Serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
a996a61d-51bb-4314-9709-f73be5ce8bd1 Gather the ingredients.
a996a61d-51bb-4314-9709-f73be5ce8bd1 Place the banana, orange juice, milk, and vanilla in a blender. Blend the ingredients until it is smooth using the highest or smoothie setting.
a996a61d-51bb-4314-9709-f73be5ce8bd1 Pour into cups.
a996a61d-51bb-4314-9709-f73be5ce8bd1 Garnish with an orange slice if you wish.
a996a61d-51bb-4314-9709-f73be5ce8bd1 This smoothie is best served immediately and while it is still cold.
269a581f-d960-4a40-a7ca-f0714e248a4d Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
269a581f-d960-4a40-a7ca-f0714e248a4d Add the juices and honey to a mixing glass.
269a581f-d960-4a40-a7ca-f0714e248a4d Stir the ingredients with a barspoon.
269a581f-d960-4a40-a7ca-f0714e248a4d Pour the contents of the mixing glass into the highball glass.
269a581f-d960-4a40-a7ca-f0714e248a4d Garnish with a maraschino cherry.
ab499ee5-1431-4258-8018-0f874dc71929 Discard the hard outer shell and seed of the longan.
ab499ee5-1431-4258-8018-0f874dc71929 In a blender, make a smooth puree of the longans.
ab499ee5-1431-4258-8018-0f874dc71929 Break the banana into smaller pieces and add to blender, and pour in coconut milk or water.
ab499ee5-1431-4258-8018-0f874dc71929 Blend until smooth. Refrigerate, if you prefer, before serving.
3d4a325d-2082-4125-97da-ec7ee8ecf340 Gather the ingredients.
3d4a325d-2082-4125-97da-ec7ee8ecf340 Put the soursop pulp, cubed coconut, cubed pineapple, leafy greens, and peeled ginger into a blender.
3d4a325d-2082-4125-97da-ec7ee8ecf340 Pulse until everything has blended together.
3d4a325d-2082-4125-97da-ec7ee8ecf340 If you'd like a thinner smoothie, feel free to add a bit of water or coconut milk, a bit at a time, until you reach your desired thickness.
3d4a325d-2082-4125-97da-ec7ee8ecf340 Serve and enjoy!
45a20b5d-45ff-4e0f-a6ba-00220aab461d Gather the ingredients.
45a20b5d-45ff-4e0f-a6ba-00220aab461d Combine all of the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth.
45a20b5d-45ff-4e0f-a6ba-00220aab461d Pour into a tall glass and enjoy.
17da79e9-513c-4c76-8465-f4ac6c33b50c Gather the ingredients.
17da79e9-513c-4c76-8465-f4ac6c33b50c In a blender, add the strawberries, milk, and sugar to taste.
17da79e9-513c-4c76-8465-f4ac6c33b50c Process the mixture until smooth and creamy.
17da79e9-513c-4c76-8465-f4ac6c33b50c If you'd like the milkshake well-chilled, add several ice cubes and blend until the ice is crushed and the mixture is thick.
17da79e9-513c-4c76-8465-f4ac6c33b50c Pour into glasses and serve.
17da79e9-513c-4c76-8465-f4ac6c33b50c Enjoy.
37c8ff51-c093-43b8-a5fc-34a10026e494 Put the mint leaves, yogurt, sweetener (if using), and lime juice in a blender. (Note: whole milk yogurt yields the most "drinkable" lassi since it doesn't contain any thickeners, but low-fat and non-fat yogurts work fine too if you are watching your calorie intake.)
37c8ff51-c093-43b8-a5fc-34a10026e494 Whirl until very smooth.
37c8ff51-c093-43b8-a5fc-34a10026e494 Taste and add more sweetener or lime juice, if you like.
37c8ff51-c093-43b8-a5fc-34a10026e494 Pour into glasses, add a mint sprig to each as a garnish, if you like, and serve.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 With a mortar and pestle, or with a rolling pin, crush the dried choke (nyaq) as much as possible.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Tie up the nyaq in a piece of clean cheesecloth. Handle the dried choke carefully, as there may be some sharp thistles.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Place the milk in a pot and add sugar and flavoring as desired.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 If using orange flower water, be aware that just a tiny bit will suffice, between 1/2 and 1 teaspoon.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Add the wrapped nyaq to the pot and place the pot over low heat.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Heat the milk just until warm, not hot.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Remove the milk from the heat and retrieve the cheesecloth.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Hold the cheesecloth over the milk and squeeze to release the nyaq’s brown liquid into the milk.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Submerge the cheesecloth in the milk again, lift it out, and squeeze to release more liquid.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Repeat several times, until no more brown liquid can be extracted.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Discard the nyaq and stir to combine the enzymes with the milk.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Strain the milk into a single bowl or individual serving bowls and cover.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Place in a warm space until the raib is set to yogurt-like or flan-like consistency; this can be as short as an hour as long as overnight.
c9f84b3e-9a3e-44fc-840e-eadea7891f57 Chill before serving.
6b83f9fd-f907-4f05-90b6-07900d19aa92 Gather the ingredients.
6b83f9fd-f907-4f05-90b6-07900d19aa92 Combine all of the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth. Add more milk or milk alternative for a thinner consistency.
6b83f9fd-f907-4f05-90b6-07900d19aa92 Pour into a tall glass and enjoy.
c9766e9c-71c0-4d44-b02a-0d7ad86689e3 Gather the ingredients.
c9766e9c-71c0-4d44-b02a-0d7ad86689e3 Put the apple, banana, and sugar in a blender with about 1/2 cup of milk. Blend until creamy and smooth.
c9766e9c-71c0-4d44-b02a-0d7ad86689e3 Gradually add the remaining milk and blend just until well mixed and foamy.
c9766e9c-71c0-4d44-b02a-0d7ad86689e3 Add a handful of ice to the blender if you like your shake well-chilled, and blend for another minute to crush the ice.
c9766e9c-71c0-4d44-b02a-0d7ad86689e3 Pour into glasses and serve.
c9766e9c-71c0-4d44-b02a-0d7ad86689e3 Enjoy!
eda55e7b-7de0-4b3f-9567-c24b6134f4e8 Place ice in the bottom of your blender. Use a handful or two, less if you want your smoothie to be more like a juice drink, more if you want it to be like a milkshake.
eda55e7b-7de0-4b3f-9567-c24b6134f4e8 Add the remaining ingredients.
eda55e7b-7de0-4b3f-9567-c24b6134f4e8 Puree until smooth. Serve immediately.
1d2b5d23-02fc-4a87-8f41-6f15b7549072 Gather the ingredients.
1d2b5d23-02fc-4a87-8f41-6f15b7549072 Blend all ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.
1d2b5d23-02fc-4a87-8f41-6f15b7549072 Serve immediately.
b2bbf7f5-2f67-468b-b928-7bc7454430d6 Gather the ingredients.
b2bbf7f5-2f67-468b-b928-7bc7454430d6 Mix fruit juices, cover and chill thoroughly in the refrigerator.
b2bbf7f5-2f67-468b-b928-7bc7454430d6 Add cold ginger ale right before serving.
b2bbf7f5-2f67-468b-b928-7bc7454430d6 Serve the fruit punch over crushed ice. If desired, add slices of lemon and/or orange just before serving.
b2bbf7f5-2f67-468b-b928-7bc7454430d6 Enjoy!
326037b8-a464-49e5-a735-e2cfda384d52 Pour the juices and grenadine into a punch bowl filled with ice.
326037b8-a464-49e5-a735-e2cfda384d52 Stir well.
326037b8-a464-49e5-a735-e2cfda384d52 Float fruit slices on top.
326037b8-a464-49e5-a735-e2cfda384d52 Serve in individual cups filled with ice.
001c3964-3251-41c3-8037-b5b3b0dd82c5 Gather the ingredients.
001c3964-3251-41c3-8037-b5b3b0dd82c5 In a large punch bowl, combine the cranberry juice and lemonade concentrate.
001c3964-3251-41c3-8037-b5b3b0dd82c5 Stir in sparkling water.
001c3964-3251-41c3-8037-b5b3b0dd82c5 Serve immediately and garnish with citrus or seasonal fruits to taste, if using.
001c3964-3251-41c3-8037-b5b3b0dd82c5 Enjoy!
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 Gather the ingredients.
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 In a large stockpot, combine the apple juice, ginger ale, orange juice, caramel syrup, and lemon juice. Taste and adjust, adding more syrup and/or lemon juice, as desired.
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 Transfer the mixture to the refrigerator to chill thoroughly.
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 Fill the punch bowl and add a ladle for serving or transfer the chilled punch to pitchers.
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 Chop the apples and add them to the punch along with ice cubes just before serving, or see the tips below for decorative ice alternatives.
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 Put the caramel ice cream topping or dulce de leche in a bowl and lightly dip the rims of serving glasses. Sprinkle with flaky salt.
5f4d7825-e504-41e9-a631-6b8d05700fd3 Enjoy!
49aee5ed-83fa-42fd-9474-1158b6f8be94 Spray brain ice mold with cooking spray. Fill with water, leaving about 1 inch of room at the top. Place in an 8x8-inch baking dish or deep dish pie plate to stabilize the mold. Freeze until firm.
49aee5ed-83fa-42fd-9474-1158b6f8be94 When ready to serve the Halloween punch, dissolve the gelatin in boiling water. Stir 2 to 3 minutes until jello is completely dissolved.
49aee5ed-83fa-42fd-9474-1158b6f8be94 Stir in orange juice concentrate. This will help cool down the Jello. Add the ginger ale, pineapple juice, and sugar. Mix well. Transfer the Halloween punch to a large punch bowl. Unmold the brain ice cube (invert onto a plate), and place in the center of the Halloween punch.
ecc8bda7-4700-4854-9550-75b83bd8dd50 Soften sherbet into the mix of fruit juices and water.
ecc8bda7-4700-4854-9550-75b83bd8dd50 Pour over a large block of ice in punch bowl.
ecc8bda7-4700-4854-9550-75b83bd8dd50 Top with ginger ale just before serving.

5f8247a4-80f4-4721-80cc-bbb1e46e987a 1/2 to 1 teaspoon matcha green tea
249f643e-82b2-48d3-8a65-d95523a9b20e For Starter Tea:
249f643e-82b2-48d3-8a65-d95523a9b20e 3 quarts filtered or distilled water
249f643e-82b2-48d3-8a65-d95523a9b20e 2 tablespoons loose-leaf tea (or 8 tea bags)
249f643e-82b2-48d3-8a65-d95523a9b20e 1 cup white granulated sugar
249f643e-82b2-48d3-8a65-d95523a9b20e For Kombucha Brewing:
